reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and soft, with a pattern that looks great, and one customer notes it's forgiving for plus-size women. The length receives mixed feedback - while some find it perfect, others say it's 6 inches too long. The material thickness is also mixed, with some finding it nice while others say it's disappointingly thin. Customers like the color accuracy and style, particularly appreciating the floral pattern. Select to learn more Fit Quality Comfort Softness Color accuracy Style Length Material thickness 145 customers mention "Fit" 119 positive 26 negative Customers like how the dress fits, describing it as loose, with one customer noting it hits right at the ankles. "This dress is ver comfortable to wear and fits well . I needed a long dress for wear and this dress was all I could find that can be worn year-round...." Read more "Super comfy. Great fit . I appreciate that the arms didn't run tight. Perfect for my son's semi-casual Christmas time wedding." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dress didn’t disappoint!
items.body: Love the dress! Nice weight, soft, stretchy material. Very comfortable. I am 5’4”and 138lbs. I ordered a medium and the fit is nice. Length great as well. Read more
items.author: Sherry Parker

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great look for the price
items.body: A great buy for the price & a lovely holiday dress. Dress is light weight which makes it comfortable to wear. I’m going to pair it with a black velvet & rhinestone belt. I’m 5’3” & length was perfect & sizing was correct with great pockets. I purchased size L Matching children’s dress available. Plaid print on sides do not match, but it is undetectable when wearing as skirt is a bit fuller. Read more
items.author: MJS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely product
items.body: Colour is great, fits well. I’d buy it again. Read more
items.author: Debbie Whitney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Comfy, Pockets!
items.body: Seriously, if you're on the fence about this maxi dress, just get it. It is so comfortable and feels amazing against my skin—definitely a great material choice. I love the length, and the sleeves aren't too tight, which is usually my biggest complaint with long-sleeve dresses. And the pockets? They're actually functional! My phone fits perfectly and stays secure. Plus, the color is exactly as pictured. I loved this one so much that I immediately went back and grabbed two more colors. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Pamela Reeder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Fit and So Cute
items.body: LOVE THIS DRESS❣️ it fits perfect and soft comfortable Great Price and Size Chart is spot on Read more
items.author: RG Woo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not true to its size.
items.body: The dress is nice but was not the true size. The sleeves very very tight. It didn’t fit me well. My daughter tried it on who is size 14-16 it fit her perfectly. She loved it. Read more
items.author: Sasy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: Really nice and soft and comfortable. Worth the money. Fits just like it shows in pic. Read more
items.author: rose buchanan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: Great dress for work and very comfortable Read more
items.author: Christine

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Blue, Flower Rose Black, Army Green, B-green Plaid, A-red Plaid, Black and White, Black, White Flower Black, Navy Blue, Black and Green, Dark Green, Brown 02, Brown Floral Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
